title: Lincoln's Humor - anecdote in fifth paragraph

content.question: The anecdote in the fifth paragraph (lines 38-52) primarily demonstrates

choices.label: how Lincoln’s storytelling spoke to a broad audience
how Lincoln improved his tales by listening to other storytellers
why Lincoln was relaxed and easygoing in the 1840s
why colleagues were uncertain of Lincoln’s political loyalties

content.answer: how Lincoln’s storytelling spoke to a broad audience

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
